ing: 4 cucumbers - peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped
des: "This soup has been in our family for 4 generations. Grandmother added the garlic, mom added Lawry'sÂ® seasoned salt, and I made it a puree. It's light and refreshing on a hot summer's day and decidedly 'cucumber!' Garnish with any or all of the following: chopped tomatoes, onions, parsley, or slivered almonds."
ins: Blend cucumbers, garlic, and 1 cup chicken broth in a blender until smooth. Add remaining 2 cups chicken broth, sour cream, vinegar, and seasoned salt; blend until smooth. Refrigerate soup until completely chilled, at least 1 hour.
